forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
